text: Pen gos nɨbi nɨgtep ma gebɨm. Anɨb ak tek yad nɨbop binɨb agtep apal tek nep agebin. Ned mubwak gos nab ayaŋ nedil nɨbop ak tunɨg dad amek, nɨbop tap si tap tɨmel gep gos anep lolɨgup. Gos anep lek, gɨ tɨmel gɨl God takaw tɨbɨlɨkɨl, tap tɨtɨmel gɨl gach sek yelɨgɨpɨm. Mɨñɨl anɨb ak nep pen, mubwak gos nab ayaŋ nedil nɨbop ak tunɨg dad amek, nɨbop yɨpɨd gɨl gɨtep gep gos anep lɨnɨmuŋ. Gos anep lek, God binɨb suŋtep ne yɨbɨl nep yenɨmɨb.
